Class Data

java.lang.Object
Data
public class Data extends Object
Chick-fil-A Database
The Data class handles all communication between the Chick-fil-A point of sales(POS) GUI and PostgreSQL database.
Since:
2023-03-08

    • getMenuItemsByInventoryId

      public Vector<Menu> getMenuItemsByInventoryId(int inventory_id)
      Gets all the menu items that make use of an inventory item. That is, returns all menu items in the inventory_to_menu junction table such that the inventory_id matches the provided parameter.
      Parameters:
      inventory_id - an id for the inventory item to search by
      Returns:
      a vector of menu items that have the inventory item

    • getInventoryItemsByMenuId

      public Vector<MyPair<Integer,Integer>> getInventoryItemsByMenuId(int menu_id)
      Gets all the inventory items that are in a menu item. That is, returns all inventory items in the inventory_to_menu junction table such that the menu_id matches the provided parameter.
      Parameters:
      menu_id - an id for the menu item to search by
      Returns:
      a Vector<MyPair<Integer, Integer>> of (inventory item, quantity) pairs that are in the menu item

    • getOrdersByMenuId

      public Vector<Order> getOrdersByMenuId(int menu_id)
      Gets all the order items that make use of a menu item. That is, returns all order items in the menu_to_order junction table such that the menu_id matches the provided parameter.
      Parameters:
      menu_id - an id for the menu item to search by
      Returns:
      a vector of order items that have the menu item

    • getMenuItemsByOrderId

      public Vector<MyPair<Integer,Integer>> getMenuItemsByOrderId(int order_id)
      Gets menu items that are in a order from the database given the order_id
      Parameters:
      order_id - a int for order_id to search by
      Returns:
      a Vector<MyPair<Integer, Integer>> object with the consisting of pairs of the menu_id and quantity

    • makeOrder

      public int makeOrder(double cost_total, Timestamp timestamp, int customer_id, int staff_id, Vector<MyPair<Integer,Integer>> menu_items)
      Makes order and make all necessary changes to database and returns the status of the queries - adds new order entry into orders table - adds all menu_to_order entries - decrements all inventory items by the amounts used
      Parameters:
      cost_total - a int for cost_total of the order
      timestamp - a timestamp for the order
      customer_id - a int for customer_id of the order
      staff_id - a int for staff_id of the order
      menu_items - a Vector<MyPair<Integer, Integer>> for menu_items in the order
      Returns:
      newly generated order_id

    • removeOrder

      public boolean removeOrder(int order_id)
      Removes order and make all necessary changes to database and - removes all corresponding menu_to_order entries - removes order entry into orders table
      Parameters:
      order_id - a int for order_id to search by
      Returns:
      a boolean value for success (true) or failure (false)

    • addMenuItem

      public boolean addMenuItem(String name, double price, String type, Vector<MyPair<Integer,Integer>> inventory_items)
      Adds a menu item and make all necessary changes to database and - adds new menu entry into menu table - adds all inventory_to_menu entries
      Parameters:
      name - a name for the new menu item
      price - a double for price of the menu item
      type - a string for type of the menu item
      inventory_items - a Vector<MyPair<Integer, Integer>> for inventory_items in the menu item
      Returns:
      a boolean value for success (true) or failure (false)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getTotalSalesSinceLastZReport

      public MyPair<Double,Timestamp> getTotalSalesSinceLastZReport(int restaurant_id)
      Gets total sales since last Z report, if no z-reports exists throw error
      Parameters:
      restaurant_id - id of restaurant
      Returns:
      double representing the total sales since last z report of restaurant

    • getXReport

      public MyPair<Double,Timestamp> getXReport(int restaurant_id)
      generates x report total sales for that day, since last z report
      Parameters:
      restaurant_id - id of restaurant to generate x report
      Returns:
      double representing the total sales for that day since last z report id

    • getZReport

      public double getZReport(int restaurant_id)
      generates z report total sales for that day and zeros the total
      Parameters:
      restaurant_id - id of restaurant to generate z report
      Returns:
      boolean representing the success or faliure of the operation

    • getSalesReport

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getSalesReport(Date sDate, Date eDate)
      Returns a sales report for the specified date range.
      Parameters:
      sDate - the start date of the report
      eDate - the end date of the report
      Returns:
      a HashMap containing the menu item names and their respective quantities sold during the specified date range
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the end date occurs before the start date

    • getRestockReport

      public Vector<Inventory> getRestockReport(int minimumQty)
      Gets a restock report of items that don't meet a minimum quantity count.
      Parameters:
      minimumQty - Quantity threshold needed to be met for restock.
      Returns:
      A Vector containing the inventory items that require a restock.
